testHelp

Class verify

  • java.lang.Object
    • testHelp.verify

  • public class verify
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of static methods to verify assertions in tests. Using verify.that(object) returns some type of assertion, depending on what the object is. Additional verifications can then be chained, e.g. verify.that("foobar").matches("foo").
